title.narrative: Private Housing Finance Markets Strengthening Project

description.narrative: a) strengthening the financial capacity of SHF to stabilize mortgage markets in the short term and to expand mortgage access to lower income groups over the medium term; and b) improving SHF's technical capacity to expand access to mortgages over the medium-term.

title.narrative: Number of housing solutions delivered per year.

comment.narrative: (Includes Jan-- October 2012). Represents 85% of the yearly target of 1 million

title.narrative: Short-term debt as a share of total liabilities17.6 percent (target was 20 % during "normal" times and 35% in "extraordinary" conditions, which in fact, are still prevailing)
Number of micro-credits supported by SHF during previous 12 months
Percentage of support to housing finance that goes to households earning between 1 - 6 MW (includes support via mortgages and microcredits) (measured in number of loans)74% (May 2009) (target was
Total amount of financial support provded by SHF to private sector intermediaries (includes loans to primary market, secondary market purchases, liquidity lines)

comment.narrative: Value represents number of borrowers. Number of active loan accounts is not available.
